overview: A federal agent is murdered while staking out a pimp's yacht. The agent's girlfriend is kidnapped to cover up any leads to an international prostitution ring catering to foreign ambassadors. Always one step behind, the investigating police detective must enlist the services of a former call girl to rescue the kidnapped woman and bust the ring.
tagline: Sherry Has Connections In High Places...And She Means Business
title: Girls U.S.A.
